Is that so...?\""},{"lineNumber":123093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが……私は」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... I\""},{"lineNumber":123094,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この時間を守る為ならば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If it's to protect this time,"},{"lineNumber":123095,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はいつまででも戦える……","translatedEnglishLine":"I can fight forever...\""},{"lineNumber":123096,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな気がした」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's how I felt.\""},{"lineNumber":123097,"originalJapaneseLine":"ざあっと謙信の髪が風に流れていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin's hair swept through the wind with a soft rustle."},{"lineNumber":123098,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういう時間が好きだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I like times like this.\""},{"lineNumber":123099,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆が笑っているこういう時間が」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Times like this when everyone is smiling.\""},{"lineNumber":123100,"originalJapaneseLine":"（おお、美人な横顔……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oh, such a beautiful profile...)"},{"lineNumber":123101,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それに、あなたも」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And also, you too.\""},{"lineNumber":123102,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":123103,"originalJapaneseLine":"皆を見守っていた筈の謙信が","translatedEnglishLine":"Kenshin, who was supposed to be watching over everyone,"},{"lineNumber":123104,"originalJapaneseLine":"気づけばランスの顔を見つめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"before he knew it, was gazing at Lance's face."},{"lineNumber":123105,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はあなたの笑う顔が好きだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I like your smiling face.\""},{"lineNumber":123106,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたが笑うと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When you smile...\""},{"lineNumber":123107,"originalJapaneseLine":"「胸の……この辺りが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"My chest... around here...\""},{"lineNumber":123108,"originalJapaneseLine":"胸に手を当てて、かすかに頬を染める。","translatedEnglishLine":"She placed her hand on her chest, her cheeks faintly blushing."},{"lineNumber":123109,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ポッと灯がともるように、安らぐ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It feels like a gentle light flickers, bringing peace.\""},{"lineNumber":123110,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それだけで……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Just by that...\""},{"lineNumber":123111,"originalJapaneseLine":"　心が満たされる」","translatedEnglishLine":"My heart is fulfilled.\""},{"lineNumber":123112,"originalJapaneseLine":"「泣きたくなるような……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's like I want to cry...\""},{"lineNumber":123113,"originalJapaneseLine":"　笑いたくなるような……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Or like I want to laugh...\""},{"lineNumber":123114,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたを作ってくれた、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"To the world and all the people who created you...\""},{"lineNumber":123115,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この世界と、全ての人に……","translatedEnglishLine":"This world and all people...\""},{"lineNumber":123116,"originalJapaneseLine":"　感謝がしたいような……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I feel like I want to express my gratitude...\""},{"lineNumber":123117,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな気分になる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's the kind of feeling I get.\""},{"lineNumber":123118,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、おお……すごいこと言うな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"O-oh... that's an amazing thing to say...\""},{"lineNumber":123119,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、私はあなたが笑っていられる、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why I want a world where you can keep smiling,\""},{"lineNumber":123120,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな世界にしたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"That's the kind of world I want to create.\""},{"lineNumber":123121,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おそらく……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Probably...\""},{"lineNumber":123122,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍に支配された世界では……","translatedEnglishLine":"In a world ruled by the demon army...\""},{"lineNumber":123123,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴方は笑えない」","translatedEnglishLine":"You won't be able to smile.\""},{"lineNumber":123124,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、その為にも戦う」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So I will fight for that reason too.\""},{"lineNumber":123125,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は頭は良くないが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm not very smart, but...\""},{"lineNumber":123126,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それだけは間違ってないと……そう思う……」","translatedEnglishLine":"That much I know is not wrong... that's what I think...\""},{"lineNumber":123127,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":123128,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Today...\""},{"lineNumber":123129,"originalJapaneseLine":"　改めて、何故戦場に立つのか……","translatedEnglishLine":"I was able to reaffirm why I stand on the battlefield...\""},{"lineNumber":123130,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その気持ちを再確認できた」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was able to re-confirm that feeling.\""},{"lineNumber":123131,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう、ランス殿」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Thank you, Lord Lance.\""},{"lineNumber":123132,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ、もっと頑張らないとな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well then, I have to try even harder.\""},{"lineNumber":123133,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":123134,"originalJapaneseLine":"「JAPANで一番の剣士な軍神様だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You are the war god, the best swordsman in JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":123135,"originalJapaneseLine":"　頼りにさせてもらうぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will be relying on you.\""},{"lineNumber":123136,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes."},{"lineNumber":123137,"originalJapaneseLine":"　存分に戦わせて欲しいと思う」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to fight to my heart's content.\""},{"lineNumber":123138,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、とりあえず今日目指すのは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, for now, today's goal is"},{"lineNumber":123139,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ドッジ大会を優勝だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"to win the dodgeball tournament.\""},{"lineNumber":123140,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、勝とう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, let's win.\""},{"lineNumber":123141,"originalJapaneseLine":"「きっと……今の私は無敵だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Surely... right now, I am invincible.\""},{"lineNumber":123142,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":123143,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜くーーーー……＞","translatedEnglishLine":"   <Guuuuu...> (stomach growling)"},{"lineNumber":123144,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm...\""},{"lineNumber":123145,"originalJapaneseLine":"「腹が減っては戦はなんとやらだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A hungry stomach makes for a poor battle, or something like that."},{"lineNumber":123146,"originalJapaneseLine":"　昼飯の用意があるらしいので沢山食べなさい」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems lunch is prepared, so eat plenty.\""},{"lineNumber":123147,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、沢山食べよう」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, let's eat a lot.\""},{"lineNumber":123148,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":123149,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":123150,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドッジボール大会は和やかなままに終了し、","translatedEnglishLine":"The dodgeball tournament ended peacefully,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はいつまででも戦える……
ざあっと謙信の髪が風に流れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin's hair swept through the wind with a soft rustle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆が笑っているこういう時間が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Times like this when everyone is smiling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆を見守っていた筈の謙信が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, who was supposed to be watching over everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけばランスの顔を見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before he knew it, was gazing at Lance's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はあなたの笑う顔が好きだ」
胸に手を当てて、かすかに頬を染める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She placed her hand on her chest, her cheeks faintly blushing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポッと灯がともるように、安らぐ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It feels like a gentle light flickers, bringing peace."
Or like I want to laugh..."
"To the world and all the people who created you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界と、全ての人に……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I want to express my gratitude..."
"That's the kind of feeling I get."
"O-oh... that's an amazing thing to say..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、私はあなたが笑っていられる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I want a world where you can keep smiling,"
That's the kind of world I want to create."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に支配された世界では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a world ruled by the demon army..."
You won't be able to smile."
"So I will fight for that reason too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけは間違ってないと……そう思う……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That much I know is not wrong... that's what I think..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて、何故戦場に立つのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to reaffirm why I stand on the battlefield..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その気持ちを再確認できた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to re-confirm that feeling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、もっと頑張らないとな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I have to try even harder."
"You are the war god, the best swordsman in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼りにさせてもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will be relying on you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存分に戦わせて欲しいと思う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to fight to my heart's content."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、とりあえず今日目指すのは
「腹が減っては戦はなんとやらだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A hungry stomach makes for a poor battle, or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼飯の用意があるらしいので沢山食べなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems lunch is prepared, so eat plenty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドッジボール大会は和やかなままに終了し、

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はいつまででも戦える……
ざあっと謙信の髪が風に流れていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin's hair swept through the wind with a soft rustle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「皆が笑っているこういう時間が」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Times like this when everyone is smiling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆を見守っていた筈の謙信が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kenshin, who was supposed to be watching over everyone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 気づけばランスの顔を見つめていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: before he knew it, was gazing at Lance's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はあなたの笑う顔が好きだ」
胸に手を当てて、かすかに頬を染める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She placed her hand on her chest, her cheeks faintly blushing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ポッと灯がともるように、安らぐ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It feels like a gentle light flickers, bringing peace."
Or like I want to laugh..."
"To the world and all the people who created you..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界と、全ての人に……

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel like I want to express my gratitude..."
"That's the kind of feeling I get."
"O-oh... that's an amazing thing to say..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから、私はあなたが笑っていられる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I want a world where you can keep smiling,"
That's the kind of world I want to create."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に支配された世界では……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a world ruled by the demon army..."
You won't be able to smile."
"So I will fight for that reason too."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけは間違ってないと……そう思う……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That much I know is not wrong... that's what I think..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 改めて、何故戦場に立つのか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to reaffirm why I stand on the battlefield..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その気持ちを再確認できた」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was able to re-confirm that feeling."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「じゃあ、もっと頑張らないとな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well then, I have to try even harder."
"You are the war god, the best swordsman in JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 頼りにさせてもらうぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will be relying on you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 存分に戦わせて欲しいと思う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to fight to my heart's content."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、とりあえず今日目指すのは
「腹が減っては戦はなんとやらだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "A hungry stomach makes for a poor battle, or something like that.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼飯の用意があるらしいので沢山食べなさい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems lunch is prepared, so eat plenty."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドッジボール大会は和やかなままに終了し、
